1.0.0.name: wordpress/conversation-viewer
1.0.0.description: Converation Viewer enables you to insert formatted converations into posts by linking to an external text file. Using CSS, the converation is formatted nicely, keeping you from having to spend time putting things into a ghastly table or some crazy markup.
